page.title: 12HOUSING IN WALKINGTON.
page.content: THE VILLAGE OF WALKINGTON CONSISTS OF MIXED HOUSING TYPES WITHH DETACHED AND SEMI_DETACHED HOUSES,TERRACED COTTAGES AND BUNGALOWS.THE TWO HOUSING ESTATES IN OUR SQUARE ARE PRINCIPALLY BETTER QUALITY SEMI_DETACHED AND DETACHED FAMILY DWELLINGS OF 3&4 BEDROOMS.THEY WERE BUILT BETWEEN 1969 AND 1975. ALONG THE MAIN ROAD RUNNING THROUGH THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE ARE A VARIETY OF OLDER TERRACED COTTAGES AND MODERN SUPERIOR DETACHED HOUSES. SEVERAL HOUSES WERE BUILT IN THE SEVENTEENTH CENTURY.WITHIN THE VILLAGE THERE ARE THREE WORKING FARMS AND NINE MORE IN THE REST OF OUR AREA.THERE ARE ALSO 2 LARGE HOUSES WITHIN THE VILLAGE _WALKIINGTON HALL AND THE OLD RECTORY. THE SMALL PART OF THE VILLAGE JUST OUT OF OUR AREA HAS A THIRD ESTATE WITH SOME COUNCIL HOUSES AND OLD PERSONS FLATS.
